{{also|stunde|stünde}} ==German== {{slim-wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|}}, from {{inh|de|goh|stunta}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*stundō||point in time, hour}}, from Proto-Indo-European *stut- (“prop”), from Proto-Indo-European *steh₂- (“to stand”).
